com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.effect

Annotation Type TLighting


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
public @interface TLighting
     An effect that simulates a light source shining on 
 the given content, which can be used to give flat 
 objects a more realistic, three-dimensional appearance.
 
 Example:
 
 Light.Distant light = new Light.Distant();
 light.setAzimuth(-135.0);

 Lighting lighting = new Lighting();
 lighting.setLight(light);
 lighting.setSurfaceScale(5.0);
 
 Text text = new Text();
 text.setText("JavaFX!");
 text.setFill(Color.STEELBLUE);
 text.setFont(Font.font(null, FontWeight.BOLD, 60));
 text.setX(10.0);
 text.setY(10.0);
 text.setTextOrigin(VPos.TOP);
 
 text.setEffect(lighting);

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder<javafx.scene.effect.Lighting>> builder
      Custom class builder for this Effect, setting this will ignore all others properties.
      java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder> bumpInput
      Sets the value of the property bumpInput.
      java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder> contentInput
      Sets the value of the property contentInput.
      double diffuseConstant
      Sets the value of the property diffuseConstant.
      TLighting.TLightDistant lightDistant
      The distant light source for this Lighting effect.
      TLighting.TLightPoint lightPoint
      The light source at a given position in 3D space for this Lighting effect.
      TLighting.TLightSpot lightSpot
      The spot light source at a given position in 3D space, with configurable direction and focus for this Lighting effect.
      java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectParse> parser
      The parser class for this annotation.
      double specularConstant
      Sets the value of the property specularConstant.
      double specularExponent
      Sets the value of the property specularExponent.
      double surfaceScale
      Sets the value of the property surfaceScale.

         The parser class for this annotation.
 
 Default value:

      • builder

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder<javafx.scene.effect.Lighting>> builder
         Custom class builder for this Effect, 
 setting this will ignore all others properties.
 
 Default value: null
        Default:
        com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.effect.TLighting.NullEffectBuilder.class

      • bumpInput

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder> bumpInput
         Sets the value of the property bumpInput.
 
 Property description:
 
 The optional bump map input. If not specified, a bump map 
 will be automatically generated from the default input. 
 If set to null, or left unspecified, a graphical image of 
 the Node to which the Effect is attached will be used to 
 generate a default bump map.
 
 Default value: a Shadow effect with a radius of 10
        Default:
        com.tedros.fxapi.effect.ITEffectBuilder.class

      • contentInput

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder> contentInput
         Sets the value of the property contentInput.
 
 Property description:
 
 The content input for this Effect. If set to null, 
 or left unspecified, a graphical image of the Node 
 to which the Effect is attached will be used as the 
 input.
 
 Default value: null
        Default:
        com.tedros.fxapi.effect.ITEffectBuilder.class
